file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Image
  version: v1beta1
  description: |
    Fawkes Image REST API.
    Access images through a REST API.
  contact:
    name:  Tim Niemueller
    email: niemueller@kbsg.rwth-aachen.de
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'

tags:
  - name: public
    description: Image public API.

paths:
  /images:
    get:
      tags:
      - public
      summary: Get list of images.
      operationId: list_images
      description: |
        Get a list of images currently available.
      parameters:
        - name: pretty
          in: query
          description: Request pretty printed reply.
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          description: get list of images
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ImageInfo'
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter

  /images/{id+}:
    get:
      tags:
      - public
      summary: Get an image.
      operationId: get_image
      description: Get an image.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: |
            ID of image to retrieve. Also includes the type through
            the file suffix. Supports jpeg or mjpeg.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: pretty
          in: query
          description: Request pretty printed reply.
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          description: get image
          content:
            image/*:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter

components:
  schemas:
    ImageInfo:
      type: object
      required:
        - kind
        - apiVersion
        - id
        - colorspace
        - frame
        - width
        - height
        - mem_size
      properties:
        kind:
          type: string
        apiVersion:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        colorspace:
          type: string
        frame:
          type: string
        width:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        height:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        mem_size:
          type: integer
          format: int64

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /images/{id+}: get: operation "get_image": parse path "/images/{id+}": path parameter not specified: "id+"
